But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all.  People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while."

Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while."

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece

His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? "Mark's head was swimming, a

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Everything changed a

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus.

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road.

His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his hig

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while."

 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a be

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore.

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you ar

 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark sudd

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly r

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.

But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousb

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore.

And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked ove

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to brea

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.

 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening

But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambl

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind w

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze,

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.

And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so re

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while."

His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife hande

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while."

Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffe

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all!

 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffee. "You still look tired dear

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffee. "You still look tired dear. I know it's been a

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffee. "You still look tired dear. I know it's been a stressful month

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road.

But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".
 Which was good, except when the mugs suddenly changed and you weren't #1 anymore. 
Some people panicked over the change.
 People didn't know what it meant - had the men whose mugs didn't say #1 done something truly horrible? Or just told their kids they couldn't have chocolate bars for breakfast? Suspicion ran rampant, and suddenly no one was certain they could trust any dads at all! 

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffee. "You still look tired dear. I know it's been a stressful month with that big work

His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffee. "You still look tired dear. I know it's been a stressful month with that big work project, and may

All of the "#1 Dad" mugs in the world change to show the actual ranking of Dads suddenly.

No one knew why it was happening.
But suddenly, a majority of the men in the world were now just "#1 Dad".

His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffee. "You still look tired dear. I know it's been a stressful month with that big work project, and may parents staying

No one knew why it was happening.

Mark was a dad whose mug stayed #1 for a very long time. But then one day he woke up and it said "Dad". No number at all. His wife freaked out "What did you do that was so bad that you don't get a number at all!" His boss was troubled "Mark, maybe you shouldn't come into work for a while." And the police..."Mr. Grant, you should come down to the station and talk with us for a while." 
Mark was sure he hadn't done anything terrible.
 Everything was just so strange and out of control these days. It was like the world had suddenly lost its mind. His wife seemed to be getting ready to leave him, it looked like he was going to lose his job, the police were watching his every move, and then that purple pig driving a motorcycle almost hit him as he was crossing the road. 
Mark took a deep breath and said, "If that pig would just wait for me to cross the road, I'll eat a piece
 asparagus cake."

Wait. What had he just said? And what drove by? Mark's head was swimming, and he couldn't seem to focus. And then suddenly he was standing outside of his high school, but he was 15, but still had a beard? And he started to hear voices....

"Wake up Mark, come on sweetheart, I know you are tired, but it's the big day."

Mark's mind suddenly rose from dreams into consciousness. He looked over at his wife who was smiling at him, and told him to hurry up and come to breakfast.  

He dressed, and sat down at the table, listening to his kids scrambling to get ready for school. His mind was still in a daze, half caught up in the dream that had felt so real. His wife handed him a cup of coffee. "You still look tired dear. I know it's been a stressful month with that big work project, and may parents staying with us for a whil
